title: Men's Transitional Weather Long Sleeve Slim Fit Button Down Shirts Business Casual Dress Shirt with Pocket
description: Easy Care: machine wash,tumble dry,low temperature ironing,requiring minimal ironing thanks to the blend of materials

Comfortable & Durable: This men's long-sleeve shirt is made from a 50% cotton and 50% polyester blend, providing a perfect balance between comfort and durability. The cotton adds breathability, ensuring you stay cool and dry, while the polyester helps retain the shirt's shape

Perfect for Transitional Seasons: This shirt is neither too heavy nor too light, it’s designed for mild weather, making it a great choice for spring and fall.It’s designed to keep you comfortably warm without overheating, making it ideal for days when the temperature fluctuates

Classic Plaid Pattern: With a modern slim fit cut, this button-up shirt features a classic plaid pattern that never goes out of style. The slim fit flatters various body types and gives a polished look that can easily transition from casual to dressy occasions

Occasions: Whether you’re dressing up for a business casual event or keeping things relaxed on the weekend, this shirt is versatile enough to suit a wide range of occasions. Pair it with dress pants for work or jeans for a casual outing
